data.persona: I ride in boats to catch fish. I catch fish in the ocean. I usually get a boat full of fish.
data.description:
You are in the the underground river.
The river is small and winding and hard to see because there are no lights within its' location. The river has many colorful rocks and gems.
The parent and the troll are here.

You are carrying a weights and a broken fishing pole, wearing a polishing cloths, a shirt, and an knife, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the troll
data.mid_motivation: I don't want the troll to stop me from fishing today
data.long_motivation: I hope to continue catching a lot of fish in the coming weeks
